level.text: Any remaining funds of an exploratory committee shall be transferred only to either:
An established principal campaign or political committee; or
A charitable organization that meets the requirements of tax laws of the District of Columbia.
All contributions and fund balances of any exploratory committee shall not be deemed the personal funds of any individual, including the prospective candidate of the exploratory committee.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1402 (February 8, 2013); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 11864 (August 16, 2013).
